description.value:
This staff is made of a dense wood and strikes the ground with an imposing boom. At the top of the staff is a perfectly round obsidian sphere that, when stared at for too long, makes viewers feel as though they're heavier than before. When wielding this staff, you gain a +1 item bonus to saves against forced movement.

Activate Cast a Spell

Effect You expend a number of charges from the staff to cast a spell from its list

Cantrip @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Gale Blast]

1st @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Air Bubble], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Gravitational Pull]

2nd @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Gentle Breeze]

3rd @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Gravity Well], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Tempest Cloak]

4th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Fly], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Variable Gravity]

5th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Elemental Form] (air only), @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Telekinetic Haul]

6th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Zero Gravity], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Vacuum]

Craft Requirements Supply one casting of all listed ranks of all listed spells.
